thread.title: BRIEF-Dana Says Under Certain Circumstances ‍Gkn Must Pay Dana Termination Fee Of $54 Million - SEC Filing

title: BRIEF-Dana Says Under Certain Circumstances ‍Gkn Must Pay Dana Termination Fee Of $54 Million - SEC Filing
text: March 14, 2018 / 8:54 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-Dana Says Under Certain Circumstances ‍Gkn Must Pay Dana Termination Fee Of $54 Million - SEC Filing Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 14 (Reuters) - Dana Inc: * DANA SAYS UNDER CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES ‍GKN MUST PAY DANA TERMINATION FEE OF $54 MILLION - SEC FILING * DANA - IF DEAL TERMINATED UNDER CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES GKN WILL BE OBLIGATED TO PAY TO DANA A TERMINATION FEE OF $40 MILLION - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2DqVC4Q ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
